component.name: Puzzle Land
component.summary: Puzzle Land is a remake of the gameboy game Daedalian opus also known as puzzle road

description.p: Puzzle Land is a remake of the gameboy game Daedalian opus also known as puzzle road. The gameplay and levels are the same but the graphics, music sounds have changed. It's a puzzle game with 36 levels. It is a tribute to a game i spend endless hours playing as a child.
The aim of the game, is to solve the puzzles in any puzzle room with the pieces you are given by moving the pieces into place such that the predefined shape is completely filled.
